When Defiled Warden enters, if it wasn't cast, create a 5/5 black Horror creature token.

Defender

{T}: Add {C}.

:: The player who chose this mode may scry 3.

At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {B}. When you do, choose one for each creature that died this turn. (You can't choose the same mode more than once.)
:: Each opponent discards a card.
